emails.subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] RE: Scrapping South Africa Deliveries
emails.to: Robero Ruiz; Lucas Rosa; Rifaeddine Hammemi
emails.body_text:
Hello Roberto,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

We have created and added the dashboard for South Africa Producer Deliveries 

You can find it by going to the Dashboard Module >  Supply and Demand > South Africa > Producer Deliveries.

or by following the link below : 


https://thul.dnext.io/dashboard/*/Supply%20and%20Demand/South%20Africa/5d90a9e6-e26e-4f21-89c8-01499814bc15

Please let us know if you want to make any adjustments on it your feedback is appreciated.

 

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Ruiz, Roberto <Roberto.Ruiz@mlp.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, July 8, 2025 9:40
To: Lucas Rosa <lucas.rosa@dnext.io>; Rifaeddine Hammemi <rifa.hammemi@dnext.io>; Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] RE: Scrapping South Africa Deliveries

 

Hi Lucas,

 

Yes, it would be great to have the weekly delivery data in the dash. I would suggest 2 seasonal charts, one showing the weekly deliveries and the second chart showing it cumulative. Similar to the farmer selling charts I guess, as the important point to monitor is both weekly arrivals but also season-to-date.

 

Thanks and regards

 

R

@Robero Ruiz <mailto:Roberto.Ruiz@mlp.com>  we can start the dashboard visualization in max 2 weeks, do you have any ideas how want to see those data?

 

Thanks

emails.body_html:
Hello Roberto,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

We have created and added the dashboard for South Africa Producer Deliveries

You can find it by going to the Dashboard Module >  Supply and Demand > South Africa > Producer Deliveries.

or by following the link below :


https://thul.dnext.io/dashboard/*/Supply%20and%20Demand/South%20Africa/5d90a9e6-e26e-4f21-89c8-01499814bc15

Please let us know if you want to make any adjustments on it your feedback is appreciated.

 

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] RE: Scrapping South Africa Deliveries

 

Hi Lucas,

 

Yes, it would be great to have the weekly delivery data in the dash. I would suggest 2 seasonal charts, one showing the weekly deliveries and the second chart showing it cumulative. Similar to the farmer selling charts I guess, as the important point to monitor is both weekly arrivals but also season-to-date.

 

Thanks and regards

 

R
